key_points: QAnon conspiracy theorists claim the Ever Given ship, stuck in the Suez Canal, is used by Hillary Clinton for child sex trafficking.
The theory connects the ship's operating company, Evergreen Marine Corporation, with Clinton's Secret Service codename 'Evergreen'.
QAnon followers also point to the ship's call sign, H3RC, as matching Hillary Rodham Clinton's initials.
Claims have been circulated on social media platforms such as Telegram and Gab by QAnon accounts with tens of thousands of followers.
These supporters believe the current situation will unveil the alleged trafficking live on camera to the world.
QAnon's beliefs center around a global cabal of pedophiles allegedly involving leading Democrats and Hollywood elites.
The conspiracy theory started with cryptic messages on message boards in 2017 by a figure known as 'Q'.
No new 'Qdrops' or messages have appeared for months, but followers continue to reinterpret existing messages.
A previous QAnon rumor involved an Evergreen vessel after the Beirut port explosion in August 2020.
These unfounded claims reflect QAnon's pattern of twisting world events to fit their conspiracy theories.
